tool_description: This API  is capable of detecting hair colour from a person's image using deep neural network with high accuracy .
title: Hair Colour Detection

api_list.name: Testing Conncetion
api_list.description: This endpoint is provided to test the connection  between User and the endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com/test"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hair-colour-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detect Hair Colour
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts the images sent from the client end and returns the response with the colour of the hair and success status.

optional_parameters.name: Content-Type
optional_parameters.default: multipart/form-data; boundary=<calculated when request is sent>
